text.__SUMMARY__: Conus pedrofiadeiroi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Conidae, the cone snails, cone shells or cones.These snails are predatory and venomous. They are capable of "stinging" humans.
text.Description: The size of the shell attains 24.7 mm.
text.Distribution: This marine species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off Boa Vista Island, the Cape Verdes.
text.References: Cossignani & Fiadeiro, Malacologia Mostra Mondiale vol. 86 p. 18; 2015
text.External links: To World Register of Marine Species
